operational.telemetry.schema.version.description: The version of the operational telemetry schema that the telemetry data is compliant with

sessionId.description: A unique identifier for the runtime session that persists through the lifetime of the language server

server.name.description: The name of the language server as reported during the LSP initialize request

server.version.description: The version of the language server as reported during the LSP initialize request

clientInfo.name.description: The name of the client (IDE/editor) that connects to the server as reported during the LSP initialize request

clientInfo.version.description: The version of the client as reported during the LSP initialize request

clientInfo.clientId.description: Unique identifier for the client as reported during the LSP initialize request

clientInfo.extension.name.description: The name of the client extension as reported during the LSP initialize request

clientInfo.extension.version.description: The version of the client extension as reported during the LSP initialize request

telemetry.sdk.version.description: The version string of the OpenTelemetry SDK.
